issue.title: Erratic vehicle behavior when breaks are applied and when accelerating

content.raw: Finished evaluating it and everything looks good.  Much more repeatable and isn't sliding.  My tests on vrc_task_1 were just a minimal sanity check.  Might want to test transitions from road to grass and back a bit if you haven't already.
content.html: Finished evaluating it and everything looks good. Much more repeatable and isn't sliding. My tests on vrc_task_1 were just a minimal sanity check. Might want to test transitions from road to grass and back a bit if you haven't already.
